content_security_policy: default-src 'self' http://localhost:3000/* https://localhost:3000/*; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://www.google-analytics.com/* https://www.google-analytics.com/ https://www.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-eval'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:;
